Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ovalbumin (277-287)[I3M, V5R, Y6W, L7K, P8R, R9F, M10K, K11L]

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity and secondary structure of a novel peptide derived from ovalbumin
Literature.Author: Tan A, Suzuki R, Yokoyama C, Yano S, Konno H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12993(MIC=25µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus NBRC 3333(MIC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli NBRC 3972(MIC=400µg/ml),Aspergillus oryzae NBRC 100959(MIC=25µg/ml),Candida viswanathii NBRC 10321(MIC=25µg/ml)
